scripts.docker-init: docker volume create pgdata && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker-teardown: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker volume rm pgdata
scripts.docker-init:dev: docker volume create pgdata && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d
scripts.docker-teardown:dev: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker volume rm pgdata
